response.overview: A deep dive into the history of women in the metal scene and highlight bands and singers such as Doro Pesch, Burning Witches, Slave to Sirens or Nervosa. What were the first female metal bands? What prejudices do the bands face? Is Metal really a safe space? And how will the future of Metal look like? All questions we will find an answer to in this documentary.
response.title: How Women are Conquering Metal
